project_abstract.cdata: The Government of China has requested Bank Group assistance in financing a fruit production and development project in Sichuan and Hubei provinces and Chongqing Municipality.  The Mid-Yangtze Agricultural Development Project's objectives are to increase production, productivity and marketability of fruit in low income areas and thus increase income and alleviate poverty.  This will be achieved by structuring production to satisfy domestic and export demand for quality, variety and seasonality, and by stimulating the development of effective marketing institutions.  The project will : 1) develop 11,986 ha of new orchards on presently uncultivated hilly slopes and rehabilitate 2,473 ha of existing ones; 2) increase the provincial Agriculture Bureaus' abilities to identify, propagate and distribute healthy, disease-free planting material to institutionalize virus indexing and budwood registration programs; 3) provide technical assistance for research and extension and training for managerial and technical staff in all aspects of fruit development and marketing; and 4) establish new and strengthen existing commercially independent Fruit Development Corporations including three new joint stock companies to market quality fruit in local, distant and export markets by introducing modern post-harvest techniques, packing and storage facilities.

P003541.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>长江中上游农业开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>中国政府要求世行集团提供资金援助，支持四川、湖北和重庆三省市实施水果生产和开发项目。本项目的目标是增加低收入地区的水果产量，提高水果生产率和适销性，从而增加农户收入，促进扶贫。为此，将调整水果生产结构，以满足国内和出口业对水果质量、品种和季节性的需求，同时促进建立运营良好的营销机构。项目将：（1）在目前在未开垦的丘陵地带新建11986公顷果园，改造现有2473公顷果园；（2）增强省农业局识别、宣传和销售健康无病种苗的能力，实现病毒标识和芽苗登记工作制度化；（3）提供技术援助，支持研究工作和农技推广服务，向管理人员和技术人员提供水果开发和营销培训；（4）新建商业上独立经营的水果开发公司，加强现有水果开发公司，包括新组建三家合股公司，通过引入现代化收获后技术、包装和储存设施，在本地、外地和出口市场上销售优质水果。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
